tool_description: Maps supplier-specific field names and values to standardized catalog schema fields using configurable mapping rules and transformations.

supplier_id.description: Identifier for the supplier whose data is being mapped

source_fields.description: List of source field names from supplier data

target_schema.description: Target schema version: v1, v2, latest

custom_mapping_rules.description: Custom field mapping rules in format 'source_field:target_field'

transformation_type.description: Data transformation approach: direct, computed, conditional

handle_missing_fields.description: Whether to create default values for missing required fields

error_messages: Invalid supplier_id: Supplier must exist in the system and have mapping configuration.
Empty source_fields: At least one source field must be provided for mapping.
Unsupported target_schema: Use one of [v1, v2, latest].
Invalid custom_mapping_rules format: Rules must be in 'source_field:target_field' format.
Unsupported transformation_type: Use one of [direct, computed, conditional].
Required field mapping failed: Critical fields could not be mapped and handle_missing_fields is false.
usage: Provide supplier_id, source_fields, and target_schema. Optionally specify custom_mapping_rules, transformation_type, and handle_missing_fields. Returns mapped field structure and transformation details.

mapping_status.description: Overall mapping result: success, partial, failed

unmapped_fields.description: List of source fields that could not be mapped

transformation_log.description: Log of transformations applied during mapping

mapping_confidence.description: Confidence score for the mapping accuracy (0-1)
